trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Santa Barbara
There was one other sighting in Santa Barbara on or around August 28th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from big sur on the 101 about 40 minutes north of santa barbara. Looked into the sky, and noticed a bright blu light that eithr apreared or was already there and it decended at a 45 degreee angle very quikly and out of site behind a mountain. (ocean was on the other side of the mountain) Very fast, probably decended a mile or more in under 2 seconds.
Summary: Blue orb light descending extremly fast at a 45 degree angle over mountain disepering on the other side
